name: Army Commando: Glorious War
description:
Army Commando: Glorious War is the best ever game of military forces against terrorist team mafia 3D 2018. Terrorists expanding their territory in the country by the help of external bad forces. They are trying to destabilize the land but they can only be defeated and eliminated by the army forces. You are a brave lead armed commando in this hopeless land-living so fight against these militants like last commando to win bravery medals in this massive army combat 3d 2018.
Game features:
Thrilling Multiple missions
Multiple guns selection
Map To identify the enemies
Auto Fire
HD graphics environment and Smart AI
Realistic Sound effects
